id.name: id
id.desc: The healthcare service identifier - This identifier is based on national identification codes, if it exists.

name.name: hospital_name
name.desc: The name of the healthcare institution

site.name: site_name
site.desc: The name of the specific site or branch of a healthcare institution

geo_qual.name: geo_qual
geo_qual.desc: A quality indicator for the geolocation - 1: Good, 2: Medium, 3: Low, -1: Unknown

city.name: city
city.desc: City name (sometimes refers to a region or a municipality)

beds.name: cap_beds
beds.desc: Measure of capacity by number of beds (most common)

prac.name: cap_prac
prac.desc: Measure of capacity by number of practitioners

rooms.name: cap_rooms
rooms.desc: Measure of capacity by number of rooms

ER.name: emergency
ER.desc: Flag 'yes/no' for whether the healthcare site provides emergency medical services

type.name: facility_type
type.desc: If the healthcare service provides a specific type of care, e.g. psychiatric hospital

specs.name: list_specs
specs.desc: List of specialties recognized in the European Union and European Economic Area according to EU Directive 2005/36/EC

url.name: url
url.desc: URL link to the institution's website

refdate.name: ref_date
refdate.desc: The reference date of the data (DD/MM/YYYY)

pubdate.name: pub_date
pubdate.desc: The date that the data was last published (DD/MM/YYYY)
